post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
Send your resume to khboo@hotmail.com


===============================================================
DESCRIPTION:

Working as a Java Developer in the Product Development and Implementation team that is in the process of developing a global web based financial application. The potential candidate will need to intimately know J2EE technologies and standards and how these technologies work together. The candidate will also need to provide appropriate documentation and will be required to assist in testing, and implementation. The candidate must be familiar with JSP, java servlets, EJB, and design patterns.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

 Develop J2EE modules that will interact with various relational database environments including SQL Server and Oracle.
 Assist in the design and development of multi-tier web based applications utilizing primarily HTML, DHTML, JavaScript and Java Server Pages (JSP) with some possible exposure to XML and the Enterprise JavaBeans (EJB) specification.
 Integrate corporate standards within all applications that are developed.
 Use various documenting tools to produce technical documentation of all applications that are developed.
 Assist in the implementation of all applications that are developed.

REQUIREMENTS:

 University degree in computer science or equivalent in combined formal education and work experience
 Experience in the financial services industry and knowledge of the securities industry is an asset
 Capable of working under tight schedule due to mission critical nature of project.
 1+ years extensive experience with WebSphere Application server
 3+ years extensive experience in Java and J2EE such as Servlets, JSP, EJB, JDBC
 A team player with a flexible and positive attitude
 Good communication and co-ordination abilities
 Good time management skills
 Understanding of UML artifacts, general and J2EE design patterns
 Experience with Frameworks such as Struts is an asset
 IBM WebSphere Administration experience such as deployment, build, configuration etc.
 Working knowledge of the following development tools and languages will be an asset:
 JavaScript
 XML
 Dynamic HTML
post.title: Looking for J2EE/Websphere Developer
